remarks: Right angle is conserved by point inversion.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 3-Nov-2019.)
statement:
israg.p $e |- P = ( Base ` G ) $.
israg.d $e |- .- = ( dist ` G ) $.
israg.i $e |- I = ( Itv ` G ) $.
israg.l $e |- L = ( LineG ` G ) $.
israg.s $e |- S = ( pInvG ` G ) $.
israg.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. TarskiG ) $.
israg.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. P ) $.
israg.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. P ) $.
israg.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. P ) $.
ragmir.1 $e |- ( ph -> <" A B C "> e. ( raG ` G ) ) $.
mirrag.m $e |- M = ( S ` D ) $.
mirrag.d $e |- ( ph -> D e. P ) $.
mirrag $p |- ( ph -> <" ( M ` A ) ( M ` B ) ( M ` C ) "> e. ( raG ` G ) ) $.
